name: Bo Jiang 0003
content: Bo Jiang's Homepage Bo Jiang (æ±æ³¢) Associate Professor (tenured) John Hopcroft Center for Computer Science School of Electronic Information and Electrical Engineering Shanghai Jiao Tong University 800 Dongchuan Rd Shanghai 200240, China Education Ph.D. in Computer Science, University of Massachusetts Amherst, 2015 (Advisor: Prof. Don Towsley). M.S. in Applied Mathematics, University of Massachusetts Amherst, 2012. M.S. in Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Massachusetts Amherst, 2008. B.Eng. in Electronic Engineering, Tsinghua University, 2006. Research Interests I am broadly interested in all aspects of the intersection of AI, networks and systems, including theoretical modeling and analysis, performance evaluation and optimization, algorithm design, and system implementation. My current research interests include distributed learning systems, efficient training and inference of LLMs, deep learning theory, etc. Prospective Students: I am constantly looking for highly motivated students to work together on problems in but not limited to the aforementioned areas. Please email me with your CV and transcripts if you are interested. Students at both undergraduate and graduate levels are welcome! Teaching SJTU CS2601: Linear and Convex Optimization, Fall 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021 SJTU MATH3806: Optimization Methods (co-taught with Kuan Yang), Fall 2024, 2023 SJTU ICE2605: Signals and Systems, Spring 2023, 2022 SJTU CS257: Linear and Convex Optimization, Fall 2020, 2019 [course website] SJTU EI331: Signals and Systems, Spring 2021, 2020, 2019 [course website for 2019] UMass CS691Q: Topics in Quantum Computing, Fall 2017, [course website] UMass CS690PE: Performance Evaluation, guest lecturer, Fall 2016 UMass ECE242: Data Structures and Algorithms, teaching assistant, Fall 2006 Students Current Students PhD: Xiao Wei, Baoxiang He, Jian Yuan, Zihao Fan, Haohui Zhang, Zhiye Wang MS: Yubo Yang, Ziyi Shang, Changlin Yang Undergraduate: Yuebo Ma, Xihan Deng, Yalin Li Alumni PhD: Yunzhuo Liu (2025), Yichen Zhu (2025, Huawei), Bowen Jiang (2025) MS: Wenhao Ma (2023, Ctrip), Zhi Shen (2023, China UnionPay), Mengtian Zhang (2024, Ant Group), Zimeng Huang (2025, ByteDance) Undergraduate: Yunzhuo Liu (2019, MS/PhD@SJTU), Yichen Zhu (2019, PhD@SJTU), Mengtian Zhang (2021, MS@SJTU), Zimeng Huang (2022, MS@SJTU), Yifan Wang (2022, MS@UCSD), Yubo Yang (2023, MS@SJTU), Yujie Xu (2024, MS@UPenn), Ziyi Shang (2024, MS@SJTU), Zhiye Wang (2025, PhD@SJTU) Publications Bowen Jiang, Yubo Yang, Bo Jiang, "Optimizing Latency for Caching with Delayed Hits in Non-Stationary Environment", Performance Evaluation, Volume 169, 102488, September 2025.
